title: Desert ecology
creator_credit: Walter H Berlet and International Film Bureau
brief_description: Deals with plants and animals living in a hot desert climate. Discusses the adaptations which enable them to withstand the long dry periods. Also shows daily living patterns of animals which enable them to survive in the great heat. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
